/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, a blend of nature and architecture, movement and stillness.
